Introduction

XUM was a three-member girl group that consisted of former NeonPunch members: Dayeon, Baekah, and Iaan, under Kpop Live Entertainment. They made their debut on September 24, 2020, with the single album "DDALALA". Their name stands for "Xumething Unlimited Move" and means "infinite movement".

On June 1, 2021, XUM was declared disbanded by their agency.
